data.name: Bloodline Champions - Huntress Pack
data.detailed_description:
The perfect pack for a new player, get a set of Bloodlines, boosts and much more to get you started! The package includes the following:

  • 8 Bloodlines*
  • Replay pass
  • 600 Gold**
  • 15,000 Blood Coins***

You'll also receive:

  • 3 Day Blood Coin Boost
  • 3 Day Experience Boost
  • The title: The Huntress
  • An exclusive avatar

* Alchemist, Glutton, Gunner, Harbinger, Astronomer, Igniter, Thorn, Spear Master.
** You use Gold to unlock bloodlines, outfits, weapon skins and much more.
*** You use Blood Coins in the game to unlock bloodlines and medallions in the game.

data.short_description: The perfect pack for a new player, get a set of Bloodlines, boosts and much more to get you started!

pc_requirements.minimum:
• Operating system:Windows® XP Service Pack 3, Vista, or 7
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV 3.0 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 1GB RAM on Windows XP, 2GB of RAM on Windows Vista/7
  • Hard disk space: 1GB Hard disk space
  • Video: nVidia or AMD/ATI video card with 128MB RAM and Shader Model 3 support (GeForce 6000 series or ATI HD2000 series)
  • Sound: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • DirectX®: DirectX® 9.0c
  • Internet: High Speed Internet (DSL or better) required
